solution_line_template: Mr. Roberts will make a total payment of ${monthly_payment} x {num_months} = $<<{monthly_payment}*{num_months}={total_monthly_payments}>>{total_monthly_payments} for 12 months.
Thus, the television costs ${total_monthly_payments} + ${down_payment} = $<<{total_monthly_payments}+{down_payment}={total_non_cash_cost}>>{total_non_cash_cost} when not paid in cash.
Therefore, Mr. Roberts can save ${total_non_cash_cost} - ${cash_price} = $<<{total_non_cash_cost}-{cash_price}={savings}>>{savings} by paying cash.
